name: Native Health of Phoenix
address: 4041 North Central Ave., Bldg. C, Phoenix, Arizona 85012

name: The Strong Heart Study (Arizona Field Center)
address: Medstar Health Research Institute Laboratory and Arizona Field Center (specific location not detailed)

name: Indian Health Service (IHS) Facilities
address: Various locations within Arizona, including Dilkon, Ganado, and Chinle
description: IHS facilities provide health services to American Indians and Alaska Natives. Some of these facilities offer diagnostic imaging and laboratory services, which can be part of cardiac testing, but they are not exclusively cardiac testing centers. Examples include Dilkon Medical Center and Sage Memorial Hospital

description: SWCVA offers a comprehensive range of cardiac imaging, testing, and diagnostic procedures. While not explicitly stated as Native American-owned, they are a significant provider of cardiac services in Arizona and may serve Native American patients
